title: FPS drop at 10 mins
body: This is the third time this has occurred, but this time my pc restarted. I logged back on and was informed that I had been given a leaverbuster.

replies.body:
If you're only seeing FPS issues after about 10 minutes, it seems like your pc is having problems rendering everything properly. It could be due to a missed driver update, but let's check over the other steps in our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to rule out those possibilities as well.

Reach back out to us if you're fps is still dropping!
